field.name: uddhidenotifier
field.label: No output
field.description: Does not display anything. Usefull when you want use the notification (popup, floating box) only. You should also hide the module title bar.

field.name: uddshowmsg
field.label: Show messages
field.description: Shows sender name and/or first characters of new message in the module

field.name: uddmanylines
field.label: Lines to display
field.description: Sets how many new messages at most are to be displayed in the module

field.name: uddmaxchars
field.label: Max characters
field.description: Sets how many characters (username + first words of messages) are to be displayed in the module

field.name: uddeenablepopup
field.label: Enable popup
field.description: Enable PMS notification (works currently with uddeIM 0.7 and above only).

field.name: uddeenableajax
field.label: Enable AJAX
field.description: Enable AJAX requests (do only use on small sites)

field.name: uddeajaxtime
field.label: AJAX refresh
field.description: AJAX refresh time in seconds (minimum 5 seconds)

field.name: uddeDHTMLpopup
field.label: Notification type
field.description: By default, DHTML floating boxes are used.

field.name: uddnametype
field.label: Displayed name
field.description: By default, full realnames are displayed.

field.name: uddeSound
field.label: Sound alert
field.description: By default, no sound notification is played. Does not work with DHTML boxes.

field.name: @spacer
field.default: Following parameters for floating box only

field.name: uddrightpos
field.label: End position
field.description: (Floating box only) Ending position of the floating box when sliding right (>0 distance from left window border, <0 distance from right window border).

field.name: uddtimeout
field.label: Display time
field.description: (Floating box only) Display time until box is removed (msec).

field.name: uddrightspeed
field.label: Floating in speed
field.description: (Floating box only) Sliding speed to the right (smaller number means faster movement).

field.name: uddleftspeed
field.label: Floating out speed
field.description: (Floating box only) Sliding speed to the left (smaller number means faster movement).
